title: Court of Petty Sessions
brief_description: A dramatised production examining a typical case at a Police Court in Perth - in this instance a car theft. The defendant pleads not guilty so a preliminary trial must be conducted. The testimony of the plaintiff and the defendant is presented and the importance if the subpoena is noted when one witness fails to attend.
